summary: This module implements a client wrapper for the Google Vertex AI Text‑to‑Speech service. It provides functionality to synthesize audio from text in batch, exposing both synchronous and asynchronous interfaces, and includes utilities for validating request parameters and handling HTTP communication.
business_intent: Allow developers to integrate high‑quality speech generation into their applications by leveraging Vertex AI, supporting scalable batch processing and flexible async workflows for real‑time or background audio creation.
